mapper.select: select * from( select rownum rnum, c.* from( select app_no , to_char(enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "enroll_date" , app_tstatus , title , a.emp_no , form_name , form_code , app_amount , app_sequence , emp_name from approval a join employee e on (a.emp_no = e.emp_no) where a.status = '1' and app_tstatus = '진행중' and a.emp_no = #{empNo} order by enroll_date )c ) where rnum between 1 and 5
select distinct emp_name , dept_name from approval a join employee e on (a.emp_no = e.emp_no) join department d on (d.dept_code = e.dept_code) where a.emp_no = #{empNo}

select count(*) from approval where status = '1' and app_tstatus = '진행중' and app_no = ( select app_no from app_line where ref_whether = 'N' and app_status ='미결재' and emp_no = #{empNo} ) order by enroll_date

select app_no , to_char(enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "enroll_date" , app_tstatus , title , b.emp_no , form_name , form_code , app_amount , app_sequence , emp_name , origin_name from approval b join employee e on (b.emp_no = e.emp_no) join attachment on (ref_no = app_no) where b.status = '1' and app_tstatus = '진행중' and app_no = ( select app_no from app_line where ref_whether = 'N' and app_status ='미결재' and emp_no = #{empNo} ) order by b.enroll_date
select count(*) from approval where status = '1' and app_no = ( select app_no from app_line where ref_whether = 'Y' and emp_no = #{empNo} and count = 0 ) order by enroll_date

select app_no , to_char(enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "enroll_date" , app_tstatus , b.emp_no , form_name , form_code , title , origin_name , emp_name from approval b join employee e on (b.emp_no = e.emp_no) join attachment on (ref_no = app_no) where b.status = '1' and app_no = ( select app_no from app_line where ref_whether = 'Y' and emp_no = #{empNo} and count = 0 ) order by b.enroll_date
select count(*) from approval where emp_no = #{empNo} and status = 1

select distinct a.app_no , to_char(enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "enroll_date" , form_name , title , form_code , origin_name , app_tstatus from approval a left join attachment t on (app_no = ref_no) left join employee e on (a.emp_no = e.emp_no) where a.emp_no = #{empNo} and a.status = 1 order by app_no
select count(*) from approval where status = 2 and emp_no = #{empNo}

select app_no , to_char(enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-dd') as "enroll_date" , app_tstatus , title , form_name , form_code , origin_name from approval join attachment on (app_no = ref_no)
where status = 2 and emp_no = #{empNo} order by enroll_date
select count(*) from approval where status = 1 and app_no = ( select distinct app_no from app_line where ref_whether = 'N' and emp_no = #{empNo} )

select distinct a.app_no , to_char(a.enroll_date, 'YYYY-MM-dd')as "enroll_date" , to_char(update_date, 'YYYY-MM-dd') as "update_date" , app_tstatus , title , emp_name , form_name , form_code , origin_name , app_change from approval a left join attachment t on (ref_no = a.app_no) left join employee e on (e.emp_no = a.emp_no) left join app_line l on (l.app_no = a.app_no) where a.status = 1 and a.app_no = ( select distinct app_no from app_line where ref_whether = 'N' and emp_no = #{empNo} ) and update_date = (select max(update_date) from app_line where ref_whether = 'N' and app_no = a.app_no ) order by app_no
